# uptimekuma_notification_bitrix24 (Resource)

Bitrix24 notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_bitrix24" "example" {
  name                 = "Example Bitrix24 Notification"
  is_active            = true
  webhook_url          = "https://your-bitrix24-domain.bitrix24.com/rest/1/webhook-key"
  notification_user_id = "123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `notification_user_id` (String) Bitrix24 user ID to receive the notification
- `webhook_url` (String, Sensitive) Bitrix24 webhook URL

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
